title: Soy-glazed Black Sesame Shrimp With Soba Noodles
summary: Soy-glazed Black Sesame Shrimp With Soba Noodles might be just the main course you are searching for. This dairy free and pescatarian recipe serves 3 and costs $9.04 per serving. One portion of this dish contains about 92g of protein, 20g of fat, and a total of 1141 calories. 5 people were impressed by this recipe. Head to the store and pick up sesame seeds, soy sauce - stock, soy sauce, and a few other things to make it today. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 87%. This score is tremendous. Similar recipes include Sesame Soba Noodles, Sesame Soba Noodles, and Sesame Soba Noodles.

winePairing.pairingText: Shrimp works really well with Pinot Grigio, Riesling, and Sauvignon Blanc. These crisp white wines work well with shrimp prepared in a variety of ways, whether grilled, fried, or in garlic sauce. You could try Loveblock Pinot Gris. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.6 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 24 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Loveblock Pinot Gris
productMatches.description: Loveblock Pinot Gris is a pale golden with hints of green. The 2013 vintage is a dry style with floral aromas and a hint of ripe pineapple. The palate reveals poached pear and blood orange, and finishes with a touch of citrus, good texture and rich mouth feel.
